1.0.name: wordpress/jquery-slides
1.0.description:
This is a highly customizable jQuery Slides plugin. You can set its width, height, pagination and many other jQuery Slides parameters. You can use it on your post or page via a schortcode [jQuery Slides] or in your template file using php function <?php if(function_exists('jquery-slides')){ jquery-slides(); } ?>.

Slides can be added as post type slide from slides menu.

This plugin is based on jQuery Slides by Vijay Kumar .

Tags: jQuery, Slider, Slides, Gallery, Plugin, Widget Requires at least: 2.9 Tested up to: 3.3 Stable tag: 1.0.1 License: GPLv2
